publisher_(хэвлэсэн_буюу_бүтээсэн_хийд_б: DGE LDAN DAM CHOS RAB RGYAS GLING,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @093A *, ,AOm SVA STI, GDOD NAS 'GYUR BA MED PA LHAN CIG SKYES, ,KUN RTOG 'KHRUL PAR SNANG BA'I DRI MA RNAMS, ,NYER SANGS SKU GSUM DON GYI SKYABS GNAS SU, ,BZHENGS PA'I GSANG CHEN DRUG PA RDO RJE 'CHANG, ,SUM CU RTZA GNYIS LHA YI 'KHOR LO CHE, ,DRANG DON RTEN DANG BRTEN PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU, ,SHAR PA DPAL LDAN GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD, ,GSUNG @093B RAB KUN GYI YANG RTZE RMAD BYUNG 'DI, ,DRI DANG KLOG DANG PHYOGS GCIG TZAM ZHIG YANG, ,NYAN SEMS SGOM RNAMS BYANG CHUB RDO RJE DANG, ,'DRA BAR GSUNGS PAS 'JAM MGON MDO SNGAGS KYI, ,BSTAN PA RIN  CHEN SRID MTHAR GNAS PA DANG, ,CHOS SBYIN  RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I SGO 'BYED PHYIR, ,DAD LDAN BLO BZANG DON GRUB ZHES BYA BAS, ,RGYU YON SBYAR TE DPAR DU LEGS BSKRUN PA'I, ,KHA BA DUNG DANG PAD RTZA LTAR DKAR DGES, ,LUS CAN PHAN BDE 'BYUNG BA'I SGO GCIG PU, ,THUB PA'I LUGS BZANG SPYI DANG DGA' LDAN PA'I, ,RING LUGS DBYAR MTSOO LTAR 'PHEL BSTAN 'DZIN RNAMS, ,@094A *, ,SKU TSE MDZAD 'PHRIN RAB TU RGYAS PAR SHOG , ,,'BREL THOGS KYIS GTZO'I MKHA' MNYAM YID CAN RNAMS, ,SGRIB GNYIS BAG CHAGS BCAS PA'I NYES PA KUN, ,MYUR SANGS DAG PA'I RLUNG SEMS ZUNG 'JUG SKUR, ,BZHENGS PA'I BLA MED BDE CHEN THOB PAR SHOG ,DER MA SON PA'I TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,THEG MCHOG 'KHOR LO BZHI LDAN RTEN BZANG PO, RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I CHOS TSUL BSHAD SGRUB KYI, ,YON TAN NOR BU'I RGYAN RNAMS SPUD PAR SHOG , ,,('DI NI RAB TSES NANG GI CHU PHO STAG LOR AE GE THU'I DGE LDAN DAM CHOS RAB RGYAS GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, ,,)
